InputPage Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for InputPage:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 print_page ()

Detailed Description

This class automatically adds the input header and the footer. Any display script using this class will POST form input to itself as that is the default action inherited from BasicPage.

Member Function Documentation

InputPage::print_page (  ) 

Print HTML output

Returns:
None
Print the page. This version includes the scale weight display as well as the head and body content from those methods. Javascript commands that have been requested via add_onload_command are all run on page load.

Reimplemented from BasicPage.
